attributes.action: Make it ‘An Offence’ to Obstruct a Driveway by Parking Across it Causing Issues
attributes.additional_details:
The road is clear in many cases but they Block a Drive and go elsewhere, when your Disabled you can not be expected to go door knocking.

Change the Law is what’s needed
attributes.background:
Parking Across Driveways causes issues to Disabled and ones who have an H bar indicating a Driveway, if I had to go say to Hospital and can not go due to the above, sometimes I have had to go as quick as possible for Asthma.

The ones who do this are doing it either Deliberately or just Lazy
